message.body: I replied to the mass text but should have just texted you, I have someone interested in the room if you're still looking. Let me know
Yeah I am but I am a little particular since I will be living with them
I don't think apple has figured out texting to multiple people yet because I always have problems with replies and replies going to everyone
Do you want to give them my number or email?
I'd like that but my schedule might be crazy before then with work and rehearsal I'll let you know tho
We should have dinner sometime if your available before tour
